knimeNode.name: Input File
knimeNode.shortDescription: Locate a file which can serve as input to another GKN

fullDescription.intro: With this node you can locate a file on your file system that can serve as input for another Generic Knime Node. This is different from "File Reader", in the sense that the file is not read into an internal KNIME Table, but stays on your file system.
fullDescription.option: Specifies the full name (including its directory) of the file.

By default, Input File will determine the file type by the extension of the file, but this behavior can be overridden (e.g. in case of a custom file extension but known file type). In that case, you can provide the extension for the file type you want the file to be interpreted as.
